name: SOK MAX
description:
SOK MAX is a sokoban classic puzzle game, the sequel of the SOK puzzle. Now there are more boxes on each level. The goal of the game is to move all the boxes to their positions. It's not as easy as it seems. The player can push one box at a time, but do not pull it off.

  • Fascinating gameplay. Lots of awesome levels from easy to hard
  • Trading cards, beautiful backgrounds, emoticons. It will be added as soon as it becomes available for this game, according to the rules of Steam
